name: Chill Town
description:
Immerse yourself in the soothing world of Chill Town, the eagerly awaited sequel to Chill Corner. Combining the best elements of a relaxing simulation and an idle game, Chill Town takes your relaxation experience to new heights.

Chill Atmosphere & Music


Immerse yourself in beautiful rooms and outdoor environments, creating a chilled atmosphere enhanced by dynamic weather and a day-night cycle.
Enjoy a diverse collection of lo-fi, acoustic, and other genres of music to enhance your relaxation, focus, or simply set the mood.

Taming Creatures


Taming and nurturing adorable Pals.

Variety of Activities




Engage in a variety of in-game activities such as fishing, cooking, insect catching...

Build & Decorate



Build and develop your own house, farm, and town, adding a personal touch to your virtual world.
Unleash your creativity by decorating both the interior and exterior of your house, making it a unique and inviting space.

Personalize Your Character


Customize and personalize your character to reflect your own style and preferences.

Furry Buddy


Take care of a lovable pet, forming a special bond and ensuring its well-being.

Optimize Your Experience


Idle experience with auto function in the game allows you to leave your device running while your character automatically fishes without the need for any manual input or simply enjoyed as a soothing background while carrying out real-life activities.
Create and customize your favorite music playlist, curating a collection of songs that perfectly accompany your Chill Town experience.

Accessibility

Full controller support. The game also offers a wide range of detailed settings to enhance and optimize your chill gaming experience according to your preferences!
